name: Twitter Streaming API Source
description: Use this source to pull tweets into Elasticsearch. You can stream specific user's tweets or search topics.

groups.title: Twitter Development Credentials
groups.description: Provide the details below, which come from your Twitter development account. Go to https://apps.twitter.com to manage yours.

groups.title: Twitter Search Information
groups.description: Provide a comma delimited list of users or topics to follow. You must provide at least one user or topic.

parameters.name: consumerKey
parameters.label: Consumer Key
parameters.description: The Consumer Key from the Twitter dev portal.

parameters.name: consumerSecret
parameters.label: Consumer Secret
parameters.description: The Consumer Secret from the Twitter dev portal.

parameters.name: accessToken
parameters.label: Access Token
parameters.description: The Access Token from the Twitter dev portal.

parameters.name: accessSecret
parameters.label: Access Secret
parameters.description: The Access Secret from the Twitter dev portal.

parameters.name: users
parameters.label: Users to Follow
parameters.description: Follow multiple users by providing a comma seperated list.

parameters.name: topics
parameters.label: Topics to Follow
parameters.description: Follow multiple topics by providing a comma seperated list.
